What has been using the battery
We have set off-peak hours of 10:00 PM - 5:00 AM to improve your battery life.
Battery manager set to Nighttime Saver Mode

The battery manager is set to Nighttime Saver mode in order to conserve battery.

\ Nighttime Saver will turn off your data connections after 15 minutes of inactivity between 10:00 PM \ and 5:00 AM, while the device is not connected to a charger.

When the data connections are turned off, your device \ will not sync or playback streaming media.

To change this behavior press "Configure" now or visit the \ Battery Manager in All APPs.
